original_text:
How much less, then, will he listen
    when you say that you do not see him,
that your case is before him
    and you must wait for him,
korean_text: 하물며 말하기를 하나님은 뵈올 수 없고 일의 판단하심은 그 앞에 있으니 나는 그를 기다릴 뿐이라 말하는 그대일까보냐

sentences.original_text: How much less, then, will he listen
when you say that you do not see him,
sentences.korean_translation: 당신이 그를 보지 못한다고 말할 때

sentences.original_text: that your case is before him
sentences.korean_translation: 당신의 사정이 그 앞에 있다는 것과

sentences.original_text: and you must wait for him,
